title: Don't Smoke In Bed
lyrics:
I left a note on his dresser
And my old wedding ring
With these few goodbye words
How can I sing
Goodbye old sleepy head
Im packing you in like I said



Take care of everything

Im leaving my wedding ring

Dont look for me

Ill get a hand

Remember darling

Dont smoke in bed



Dont look for me

Ill get a hand

Remember darling

Dont smoke in bed



(Thanks to mook for these lyrics)
